resources.string:
PennyWise is a simple and efficient app to manage your personal finances. Track your income and expenses, categorize your transactions, and view detailed statistics to better understand your spending habits.

With PennyWise, you can:
• Add and manage income and expenses
• Categorize transactions
• View monthly statistics
• Track your financial progress

Developed by Dewmith Mihisara

Privacy Policy

Last updated: [Date]

This Privacy Policy describes how PennyWise collects, uses, and protects your information.

Data Collection

PennyWise stores all your financial data locally on your device. We do not collect, transmit, or store your personal information on any external servers.

Local Storage

All transaction data, including amounts, categories, dates, and notes, are stored in a local database on your device. This information never leaves your device unless you explicitly choose to share it.

Data Security

Your financial data is stored securely on your device using standard Android data storage mechanisms. We recommend that you:
• Keep your device locked with a secure password or PIN
• Regularly backup your data
• Do not share your device with unauthorized users

Third-Party Services

PennyWise does not use any third-party analytics services or advertising networks. We do not share your data with any third parties.

Your Rights

Since all data is stored locally on your device, you have full control over your information. You can:
• View all stored data within the app
• Delete transactions at any time
• Uninstall the app to remove all data

Changes to This Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be reflected in the app.

Contact Us

If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us through the app store.

By using PennyWise, you agree to this Privacy Policy.
